articles.title: Could brain tissue healing process lead to tumour growth? - Brain Tumour Research
articles.description: Following the analysis of cells from 26 glioblastoma patients, a Canadian study has concluded that the healing process that kicks in after a stroke, trauma, infection or other brain injury, can actually trigger the development of these brain tumours...

articles.title: Coronavirus symptoms: Is dizziness a sign of COVID-19? Here's what experts want you to know - Times of India
articles.description: Experts worry that unusual dizziness and fainting spells could be a non-typical sign of neurological damage caused by the SARS-COV-2 virus.
articles.content:
One of the reasons many feel dizziness could be related to COVID-19 is because of the many known complications of the virus.
